roleset.name: Place things with space in between

role.descr: how far apart, amount of space in between

example.name: Adjectival usage
example.text: Six months later, [his back]-1 was still etched *-1 with evenly spaced grooves.

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: Mary spaced the corn crops two feet apart.

roleset.note: Framed by Claire based on instances in Webtext 2.5-2. Comparison to 'place.' No Vncls.
